message_1: An encrypted message using Rail Fence Cipher has been intercepted, and the only known information is that it was created using 3 rails. The message is "EVIGERHTESETOHIYRDE". Determine the original message.
message_2:
To decrypt the message using the Rail Fence Cipher with 3 rails, we need to arrange the letters in a zigzag pattern with 3 levels and then read the message horizontally. The message has 17 characters, so the arrangement would look like this:

E . . . I . . . R . . . E
. V . G . H . S . T . D
. . Y . . . E . . . O

Now, read the message horizontally:

EIR EVGHSTD YEO

The original message is "EIREVGHSTDYEO".
